name: Yathansh Sharma
description: The ultimate web wizard, content conjurer, and comedy maestro. Mastering the digital realm, he crafts stellar websites, weaves engaging content and sprinkles humor seamlessly.

name: Kovid Vishrut
description: Meet the maestro behind the scenes. Beyond flawless operations, he's the rebel photographer and fearless experimenter, turning logistics into an art and capturing the extraordinary through his lens. Cool, precise, and unstoppable.

name: Nikhil Khandelwal
description: Born to lead, he navigates the team's inner workings with a laid-back finesse, ensuring smooth sails. Juggling talents like a pro, Nikhil's the cool maestro preventing clashes and crushing deadlines with style. Team harmony? He's got it covered.

name: Bhumik Bhatia
description: A skilled executive, he possesses a strong grasp of the industry and a successful history of cultivating strategic partnerships. He Demonstrates a dynamic approach to business expansion and excels in identifying growth opportunities.

name: Manal Johri
description: Say hello to the dynamo, Manaal Johri â€“ Content Strategist, Actor, and Poetry Rizzler. With a cool mix of strategy, on-screen charisma, and poetic finesse, Manaal crafts content that resonates, performs on stage, and weaves words like a true rizzler.

name: Devyansh Chhonkar
description: He rocks diverse editing tools, effortlessly fusing creative vibes with technical wizardry. A proven maestro, Chhonkar cranks out top-tier content, leveling up projects with cutting-edge flair and innovation.
